title: Judge Throws Out Convictions Of Civil Rights Pioneers, 'Friendship 9'
teaser: It's been 54 years since students from Friendship College were arrested for a sit-in at McCrory's Five and Dime in Rock Hill, South Carolina. On Wednesday, a Rock Hill judge exonerated them.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
